## `prefer while`

### `0`

```

 unknown:1 lint/preferWhile FIXABLE ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

  ✖ A while loop should be used over a for loop

    for (; x.running;) x.step();
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Recommended fix

      │ - for (;·x.running;) 
    1 │ + while (x.running) {
    2 │ + ··x.step();
    3 │ + }

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✖ Found 1 problem

```

### `0: formatted`

```
while (x.running) {
  x.step();
}

```
